roleset.name: hear by 'accident'
roleset.note: OVERHEAR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overhear' based on sentences in brown. (from overhear.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with conversants
example.text: It is evident that Lizzie did not tell everything [0] she overheard [*T*-3]between her father and her Uncle Morse.
example.arg: between her father and her Uncle Morse

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Thornburg added in a lower voice but Andy overheard, ``They act more like a jury than an audience''.

example.name: funky passive
example.text: McKinley-1 was overheard [*-1] to say that he would like to get the knife into Spencer's possession and that...
example.arg: to say that he would like to get the knife into Spencer's possession and that...
